name: The Cowlitz Gamers' Lost Adventure
overview:
A mini-sequel to The Cowlitz Gamers' 2nd Adventure. It consists of only 18 stages but a new playable character. The 18 stages were inspired by the unreleased predecessor to the original Cowlitz Gamers' Adventure programmed for the ZX Spectrum.

The 2019 version of this game was included in the Action 53 Vol. 4: Actually 54 multi-cart. The stand-alone 2020 version is slightly different graphically.
